cos.text: CO1 Apply ER modeling and database design concepts to design and implement database solutions for real-world applications
CO2 Analyse given scenarios and apply suitable database techniques including normalization and functional dependencies
CO3 Analyse scenarios involving transaction management and concurrency control using ACID properties
CO4 Analyse query optimization techniques and execution plans for database performance improvement
CO5 Ability to conduct experiments as individual or team using modern tools like MySQL and MongoDB and Oracle
CO6 Write clear and concise experiment reports that detail the methods, results, and conclusions of DBMS experiments
